user.title: Create Chore
user.description: Chores allow you to track chores around the house, automatically advance them and receive notification when some maintenance is due.

scheduled.title: Create Scheduled Chore
scheduled.description: Schedule a chore: daily, weekly, etc

counter.title: Create Counter Chore
counter.description: Chore based on a counter. For example: filter in dryer should be cleaned after N cycles. Cat's litter should be cleaned after X "poops"

counter.description: Chore based on a counter. For example: filter in dryer should be cleaned after N cycles. Cat's litter should be cleaned after X "poops"

increment.name: Increment
increment.description: Increment counter in a chore (only for Counter Chore type)

set_counter.name: Set Counter State
set_counter.description: Set state of a counter within a chore

reset_from_today.name: Reset from today
reset_from_today.description: Set next due date starting from today or from the "last due date". For example, if a chore should be done only on Wed every week, turn this flag off to set next due date to the next Wed upon completion. (applicable only to scheduled chores)
